resources.string: An error occurred while loading the posts
The first synchronization can take up to 1 minute
You should only reload data when there are some unreasonable apps, we will be rolling out customization soon.
In the process of synchronizing data, you can not perform the operation

Group App will be able to retrieve all the Installed Application on the device, it can include the app is information as well as the app name and packagename. It will serve for Group App to get group and category information of relevant application to rearrange the list of apps and show into screen.
● Get Installed Application permission
Used to get a list of all the apps on the device to display and group the apps by category, then display it on the screen.
You have not agreed to get information from the list of apps installed on the device
